column4: hi, i am hoping someone can help me. for some reason when i try to load up a memory card via a card reader it wont mount now at all. ever since i upgraded to 7.10 it wont mount any of the memory cards in my card reader.
unplug replug the sd card then type dmesg| tail do you see a sda1 or sdb1 or sdc etc?
when i do that i get
the card i am using is not a sd but a ms duo
